segments.text: Observing this kitchen, I feel a pang of worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying the plate so methodically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the running water is causing an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling out uncontrollably onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, and she stands right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression shows she's completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to a slip or damage to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing that unstable stool dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling cookies from the jar secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits below, hand outstretched in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They might fall and get hurt in this wet mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked from the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden seems serene, untouched by this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope nothing bad happens to any of them.
segments.speaker: PAR
